btrfs-sxbackup
==============

Synopsis
--------------

.. autoprogram:: btrfs_sxbackup.cli:parser
    :maxdepth: 1
    :prog: btrfs-sxbackup

Description
-----------

Btrfs snapshot backup utility

--------
